article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for Data Replication Service (DRS)
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating from GT4.0
section.para: The public interfaces to Java WS Core (on which DRS is based) have changed and are not backwards compatible. For information on updating your services, see .

section.title: Migrating from GT3
section.para: This component is new with GT version 4.0.0; therefore, this section does not apply.

section.title: Migrating from GT2
section.para: This component is new with GT version 4.0.0; therefore, this section does not apply.
